🌊 "Ocean Breeze" - A refreshing and invigorating flavor combination of sea salt, citrusy lemons, and a hint of sea spray, capturing the essence of a brisk ocean breeze on a summer day.
🌴 "Desert Oasis" - A rich and decadent blend of creamy dates, sweet caramel, and a hint of smoky cardamom, transporting you to a lush and serene desert oasis.
🌻 "Blooming Garden" - A delicate and floral combination of rose petals, orange blossom water, and a hint of green tea, evoking the sweet and fragrant scent of a blooming garden on a warm spring day.
🏔️ "Forest Floor" - A earthy and mossy flavor profile featuring notes of wild mushrooms, forest berries, and a hint of damp earth, capturing the essence of a dense and mysterious forest.
🌮 "Tropical Storm" - A bold and adventurous blend of spicy chili peppers, tangy pineapple, and a hint of coconut milk, evoking the thrill and excitement of a tropical storm.
